samples.question: [Transcript chunk 3]
samples.transcript: I am a content creator how often do you use social media so as I mentioned earlier I use social media a lot around like five or four or five hours a day even though I fully understand that using social media as is not really healthy for my mental health but I can help since this is my job do your friends use social media a lot Yes actually for my observations all of my friends use social media a lot some of them even use social media right after they wake up in the morning and sometimes they can like scroll their phone mindlessly for four to five hours a day and you know some of them lead a very sensory lifestyle because of this and sometimes homework is sacrificed for a few hours on social media do you prefer to have a few friends or a large group of friends refer to to your friends even though when you have a large group of friends you can like you can have the opportunities to meet friends of different personalities characteristics or you have the abilities to know friends who share different interests and hobbies with you I still think this is better for people to have a few friends because sometimes this is much easier for you to confined in your friends about some sensitive matters thanks.

samples.question: >> How do you usually spend your weekends and why?
samples.transcript: >> I usually spend my weekends watching movies and series because that is my favorite activity and I do not get time for I do not get enough time for that during the weekdays. So, I do that on weekends.
samples.transcript_original: >> I usually spend my weekends watching movies and series because that's my favorite activity and I don't get time for I don't get enough time for that during the weekdays. So, I do that on weekends.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> I usually spend my weekends watching movies and series because that is my favorite activity and I do not get time for I do not get enough time for that during the weekdays. So, I do that on weekends.

samples.question: >> Which is your favorite part of the weekend?
samples.transcript: My favorite part of the weekend is the evening because I get to hang out with my friends. Going out with my friends is also another favorite activity of mine.
samples.transcript_original: My favorite part of the weekend is the evening because I get to hang out with my friends. Going out with my friends is also another favorite activity of mine.
samples.transcript_cleaned: My favorite part of the weekend is the evening because I get to hang out with my friends. Going out with my friends is also another favorite activity of mine.

samples.question: >> Do you think your weekends are long enough?
samples.transcript: >> No, I do not think my weekends are long enough because I have a lot of chores to do and one day is not enough for all those activities while enjoying myself.
samples.transcript_original: >> No, I don't think my weekends are long enough because I have a lot of chores to do and one day is not enough for all those activities while enjoying myself.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> No, I do not think my weekends are long enough because I have a lot of chores to do and one day is not enough for all those activities while enjoying myself.

samples.question: >> Do you think everyone deserve weekends?
samples.transcript: Yes, I believe everyone deserves a weekend after a long hectic week to spend some time with their loved ones and hang out with their friends or even to take some rest.
